metadata.title: CVE-2015-8026 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the verify_vbr_checksum function in exfatfsckin exfat-utils before 1.2.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite loop) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a craftedfilesystem.

criterions.comment: exfat-utils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
